column5: Pleasure meeting ya tonight! & Thanx so much for the reels.....You have no idea how excited i have been all weekend just over some reels.......and seriously when the weather warms up and boating season is in full swing bring down the mrs and will hit the lake & do some fishing.  I AM JUST ITCHING TO TRY THE NEW REELS OUT. After we dropped my son off at the airport  tonight we headed up to BPS and brought two new rods. I was really good and thats all i brought....But thats only because i am waiting for boxing day then i am gonna be back up there again......   Anyway thanx so much again
